Syslog.name: inputField
Syslog.label: Input field
Syslog.description: The name of the input field to parse.

Syslog.name: specification
Syslog.label: Specification
Syslog.description: The Syslog specification; RFC_5424 or RFC_3164. Defaults to RFC_5424

RenameField.name: renameFrom
RenameField.label: From
RenameField.description: The name(s) of field(s) to rename from

RenameField.name: renameTo
RenameField.label: To
RenameField.description: The name(s) of field(s) to rename to

RemoveField.name: fieldToRemove
RemoveField.label: Field name
RemoveField.description: The name(s) of fields to remove from the message

Timestamp.name: timestampField
Timestamp.label: Timestamp field
Timestamp.description: The name of the field that will contain the timestamp. Defaults to ‘timestamp’

DelimitedText.name: inputField
DelimitedText.label: Input field
DelimitedText.description: The name of the input field to parse.

DelimitedText.name: delimiter
DelimitedText.label: Delimiter
DelimitedText.description: A regular expression used to split the text. Defaults to comma

DelimitedText.name: trim
DelimitedText.label: Trim
DelimitedText.description: Trim whitespace from each value. Defaults to true
